testcase.name: Comprehensive Login Page UI Testing
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Xealei login page..........................................passed When User should verify the client code is addressed in tab url address in login screen.passed Then User should verify the 'LOGIN' text is displayed.......................passed Then User should verify that after landing on the login page the login button is disabled.passed Then User should verify the field label name and placeholder text for Email and Password fields.passed And User should enter password in password field............................passed Then User should verify that entered password is **hide.....................passed And User should click the eye icon in the Password field....................passed Then User should verify that entered password is Unhide.....................passed And User should verify Forget password link is working......................passed Then User should verify the copy rights "Powered by Alphind Â© 2024" text is displayed.passed

testcase.name: To verify the error validation messages in Login page
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Xealei login page..........................................passed And User should verify that email field is mandatory "Please enter email ID".passed Then User should verify that password field is mandatory "Please enter password".passed When User should perform login with invalid data............................passed Then User should verify the error message after performed login with invalid data "User not found".passed When User should perform login with valid email and invalid password........passed Then User should verify the Toastbar message after performed login with valid email and invalid password 'Incorrect password'.passed

testcase.name: To verify Xealei Login page by click the ENTER key with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Xealei login page..........................................passed When User should perform login with valid email and password by click the Enter key.passed Then User should verify once the page is navigated to HOME_DASHBOARD successfully "Home".passed

testcase.name: To verify Xealei Login page with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Xealei login page..........................................passed When User should perform login with valid email and password................passed Then User should verify once the page is navigated to HOME_DASHBOARD successfully "Home".passed
